snippet: “Cross Culture” by the jazz musician Joe Lovano with Us Five and “Burning Lights” by the Christian rock star Chris Tomlin.
abstract: Ben Ratliff reviews album Cross Culture by jazz musician Joe Lovano with Us Five; Jon Caramanica reviews recording Burning Lights by Christian rock singer Chris Tomlin.

byline.original: By BEN RATLIFF and JON CARAMANICA

lead_paragraph: “Cross Culture” by the jazz musician Joe Lovano with Us Five and “Burning Lights” by the Christian rock star Chris Tomlin.

headline.main: New Albums by Joe Lovano Us Five and Chris Tomlin
